name: Mimijumi Baby Bottles
description:
“Mothers, Nurses, Doctors, Lactation Experts and Industrial Designers have come together to create the perfect baby bottle.

With natural colours, textures and forms, the mimijumi baby bottle provides the perfect complement to breastfeeding and the best possible transition to bottle feeding. 

The innovative nipple design replicates a mother's breast, creating a natural feeding and latching experience for a happier and healthier bottle fed baby. Also functioning like a breast, the non-free-flow nipple design means your baby has to actually latch onto the nipple and suckle in order to produce the milk. This replicates the breastfeeding experience like no other bottle on the market.

The bottles are easy to open and clean, and are top rack dishwasher safe. Integrated venting also helps prevent colic, and the bottle has a skid free base for those hard one-handed refills. 

All mimijumi baby bottles are BPA and latex free, EA free, and exceed all Australian safety standards. mimijumi really is the Next Breast Thing.”

name: Blooming Bath Puddle Wash Cloths
description:
If the Blooming bath was a cake, this would be the icing!! 

Each Puddle Washcloth is 100% handmade from the plush polyester remnants of a Blooming Bath product, meaning they're individual and unique - no two are the same!  (Blooming Bath is committed to reducing their carbon footprint by better management of raw materials and reducing waste).
 
They're also incredibly soft, and extra gentle for bathing baby's delicate parts.  

Available in Twin packs of Hot Pink, Turquoise & Canary Yellow to match your Blooming Bath.

 (Ivory yet to be released).

No added postage if purchased with Blooming Baby Bath

options.name: Blooming Baby Puddles Face washers (Pack 2) Pink
Blooming Baby Puddles Face washers (Pack 2) Turqouise
Blooming Baby Puddles Face washers (Pack 2) Canary Yellow

name: Baby Bath Time - Blooming Baby Bath
description:
NEW TO AUSTRALIA!

Introducing the innovative Blooming Bath - Winner of the Parent Tested Parent Approved Award!  PTPA is the largest parent-testing community and seal of approval recognized worldwide!

The Blooming Bath is handmade from incredibly soft & cuddly materials, and fits snuggly into any size or shape sink, hand basin or tub.  It cradles even the tiniest baby and protects them from the usual hard surfaces of a bath.   With no strenuous, lengthy bath time preparations, and fresh warm water on tap, bath time CAN be a happy, care free bonding experience.

Simply place the Blooming Bath into your sink and fill to the required depth. Place baby onto Blooming Bath's plush petals and enjoy.  When you're done, fold petals in to squeeze and remove excess water using the 'spin' cycle in your washing machine.  Use the hangtag to dry naturally, or pop in the dryer for 10 minutes.  The Blooming Bath is machine washable, and is also great for tummy time, photo-shoots and makes a cute play mat for toddlers. Best of all it's so easy to store, and at less than 700gms it's perfect for travelling too!  

Why not grab a spare for Nan & Pop's house.
